name: Aba
description: Loose, usually black robe worn by Fremen women and Bene Gesserit Sisters.

name: Abu 'd Dhur or Abu Dhur
description: the Father of the Indefinite Roads of Time, possibly in Fremen mythology or Orange Catholicism.

name: Ach
description: a worm-steersman's term for a left turn.

name: Abomination
description: Bene Gesserit term for one who acquires full consciousness in the womb as a result of being exposed to the spice agony.

name: Adab
description: the demanding memory that comes upon you itself.

name: Adept
description: a person who has entered one of the Great Schools, for example  Bene Gesserit or Ginaz Swordmasters and is very skilled or has obtained a lot of training or knowledge but is not yet necessarily a Reverend Mother or master.

name: Advocate General
description: an officer of the imperial court who oversees the admission of audiences and similar tasks.

name: Ajidamal (or Amal)
description: Disastrously-flawed synthetic spice melange created by the Tleilaxu's Project Amal before the process of producing spice in axlotl tanks was perfected.

name: Akarso
description: a plant native to Sikun ( of 70 Ophiuchi A ) characterized by oblong leaves. Its green and white stripes indicate the constant multiple condition of parallel active and dormant chlorophyll regions.

name: Akkad
description: one of the months on Arrakis and the new Atreides Calendar.

name: Alam al-Mithal
description: the mystical 'world of similitudes' where all physical limitations are removed.

name: Al-Lat
description: mankind's original sun; by usage: any planet's primary.

name: Al-Mutakallim
description: one of the names of God in Zensunni faith.

name: Al Ourouba
description: the mythical home of the Zensunni on Earth

name: Alia Cult
description: an cult of Gammu which was oppressed by Leto Atreides II Fish Speakers.Possibly a remnant or revival of Alias Priesthood.

name: Alias Priesthood
description: a priestly organisation formed by Alia after her brothers alleged death to secure her position and to push back the influence of the Qizarate.Alias priests were partially recruited from the Quizarate though.

name: Amazons
description: a mythical tribe or warrior-women on old earth, later applied to Alias all female guard and Letos Fishspeakers.

name: Ambiel
description: a light fabric used for fine clothing

name: Ampoliros
description: the legendary "Flying Dutchman" of space.

name: Amtal or Amtal Rule
description: a common rule on primitive worlds under which something is tested to determine its limits or defects. Commonly: testing to destruction.

name: Anti-fatigue Pills
description: a potent stimulans used by the Military

name: Aql
description: the test of reason. Originally, the "Seven Mystic Questions" beginning: "Who is it that thinks?"

name: Arcana
description: the Bene Gesserit secret inner teachings.

name: Arifa
description: the fremen term for "Judge".Used as a title of their leaders by the tribe of Sietch Jacurutu.

name: Armored Screen
description: a defensive construction similar to a big protective shield.

name: Arrakeen
description: the first settlement on Arrakis;  long-time seat of planetary government.

name: Arrakis
description: the planet known as Dune; third planet of Canopus.

name: Assassin's Handbook
description: third-century compilation of poisons commonly used in a War of Assassins. Later expanded to include those deadly devices permitted under the Guild Peace and the Great Convention.

name: Assyria
description: an ancient realm on old earth.Home to enemies of the Bene Gesserit's ancestors.

name: Auliya
description: in the Zensunni Wanderers' religion, the female at the left hand of God; God's handmaiden.

name: Aumas
description: poison administered in food. ( Specifically: poison in solid food. ) In some dialects: Chaumas.

name: Auqaf
description: the military arm of the Church of Muad'dib in opposition to the Hajj.

name: Axlotl tank
description: Biological tank in which gholas and melange were be produced, primarily by the Bene Tleilax.In truth the female variant of the Tleilaxu race.

name: Ayat
description: the signs of life. ( See Burhan. )

name: Ayil
description: the day of the first light on Arrakis and later the day of the Kwisatz Haderach.

name: Lake Azrak
description: a gypsum plain on Arrakis, west of Jacurutu.The remnant of a prehistoric ocean.

name: Bahada
description: a great fissue or crack in rock

name: Bahr bela ma
description: “the ocean without water”  a name of the open desert of Arrakis

name: Bakka
description: in Fremen legend, the weeper who mourns for all mankind.

name: Baklawa
description: A type of pastry made with date syrup.

name: Baliset
description: Nine-stringed musical instrument, lineal descendant of the zithra, tuned to the Chusuk scale and played by strumming. A favorite instrument of Imperial troubadours.

name: Barachan
description: an elevated shifting sand dune.

name: Baradye Pistol
description: a static-charge dust gun developed on Arrakis for laying down a large dye marker area on sand.

name: Baraka
description: a living holy man.

name: Bashar
description: (often Colonel Bashar): an officer of the Sardaukar a fractional point above Colonel in the standard military classification. Rank created for military ruler of a planetary subdistrict. ( Bashar of the Corps is a title reserved strictly for military use.)

name: Battle Language
description: any special language if restricted etymology developed for clear-speech communication in warfare.

name: Bedwine
description: a nomadic desert-dweller; usually referring to the Ichwan Bedwine, the brotherhood of all Fremen on Arrakis.

name: Behemoth
description: in Fremen belief a demon, a great Sandworm.Possibly also an archaic type of ship or sea-monster.

name: Bejato
description: a leaf-plant  native to Arrakis.

name: Bela Tegeuse
description: fifth planet of Kuentsing: third stopping place of the Zensunni forced migration.

name: Bene Gesserit
description: the ancient school of mental and physical training established primarily for female students.

name: Beret
description: a soft, round, flat-crowned woven-hat, worn by the Sardaukar and imperial ladies-in-waiting.

name: Berserker
description: Death commandos of the fishspeakers.Usually Individuals which were punished for having made a mistake were ordered to commit Berserker or suicide missions.

name: B.G.
description: idiomatic for Bene Gesserit except when used with a date. With a date it signifies Before Guild and identifies the Imperial Dating system based on the genesis of the Spacing Guild's monopoly.

name: Bene Sherk
description: a scattering of newer settlements east of Jacurutu and northeast of the Tanzerouft.

name: Bene Tleilax (or Tleilaxu)
description: Secretive and powerful patriarchal race known for their genetic manipulation technologies.

name: Bhotani Jib
description: see Chakobsa.

name: Bi-La Kaifa
description: Amen. (Literally: "Nothing further need be explained.")

name: Bicouros of Shaitan
description: "a lazy missionary of the devil".Somebody who serves an evil purpose out of lazyness or to achieve privileges.

name: biological invasions
description: in context of military, biological warfare agents.Used during the Jihad by both sides.Caused post-war maladies such as the "spitting disease".

name: Bindu
description: relating to the human nervous system, especially to nerve training. Often expressed as Bindu-nervature.

name: Bindu Suspension
description: a special form of catalepsis, self-induced.

name: Biyan
description: "White Lands", another name for the great Gypsum plain south of the Habbanya Erg.

name: Bled
description: the flat and open desert of Arrakis.

name: Body temperature pills
description: pills used by Outworlders on Arrakis to hold the body temperature low, especially people who  did use cheap stillsuit imitates instead of fremen ones.

name: Book of Kreos
description: a Fremen collection of Zensunni Sayings.

name: Book Leto
description: a collection of sayings and comments by Leto II  ascribed to Harq al-Ada.

name: Bourka
description: insulated mantle worn by Fremen in the open desert.

name: Bravos
description: a houses armed retainers or Assassins.

name: Bu Ji
description: Zensunni Philosopher from Fremen tradition.

name: Burhan
description: the proofs of life. (Commonly: the ayat and burhan of life.)

name: Bureau of faith
description: A name of the Royal inquisition under Leto II.

name: Burseg
description: Commanding general of the Sardaukar.

name: Butlerian Jihad
description: The epic crusade by mankind against Thinking Machines. Also called The Great Revolt.

name: Cadelam
description: originally a Fremen tribe from Sietch Abbir, during the shortlived reign of Alia an uprising Family on the verge of becoming a House Minor.

name: Caid
description: Sardaukar officer rank given to a military official whose duties call mostly for dealings with civilians. Officers of this rank often commanded as military governors over a full planetary district. The rank was above the rank of Bashar but not equal to a Burseg.

name: Caliph
description: a ruler of the Muslim world on Old Earth, later used by the Desposyny, the descendants of Leto II.

name: Canto and Respondu
description: an invocation rite, part of the panoplia Propheticus of the Missionaria Protectiva.

name: Carryall
description: Aircraft used on Arrakis to transport large spice mining, hunting and refining equipment.

name: Caseri
description: ruler title, possibly from the times of the Old Empire.

name: Catchtube
description: tube of a Stillsuit, connected to the suits catch-pockets.

name: Caveat
description: a warning or condition.

name: Cellular restructuring
description: Tleilaxu and Ixian term and technique describing the creation of a new human being from another humans basic genetic information, different from a Ghola or a clone.Hwi Noree was created via Cellular restructuring of genetic base material gained from Malky.

name: Chakobsa
description: The Language of the Fremen of Arrakis.

name: Catchpocket
description: Integral part of Stillsuit and Stilltent that used to contain reclaimed water.

name: Cave of Birds
description: a cave in the Habbanya ridge.During the War on arrakis briefly Paul Muad'dibs base of operations.

name: Chaumas
description: Poison in solid food as distinguished from poison administered in some other way.

name: Chaumurky
description: Poison administered in a drink.

name: Cheops
description: a game, also known as pyramid-chess.

name: Cherem
description: a brotherhood of hate.

name: CHOAM
description: A corporation which essentially controlled the economy of the Known Universe, with shares and directorships determining each House's income and financial leverage.

name: Church of Muad'dib
description: The Church or political Organisation of Priests which revered Paul'Muad Dib as Mahdi, Messiah and quasi-godhead, developed from fremen Religion after Paul Atreides supposed death and active until tne reign of Leto II.

name: Chusuk
description: the "Music planet".

name: Cibus hood
description: a shapeless mask of ixian design, not really making it's wearer invisible, but completely hiding his features, making him fully unrecognizale.

name: Cielago
description: a species of bat indigenous to Arrakis.

name: Coan-teen
description: The female deathspirit who walks without feet of Fremen mythology.Also a diffaming name used for Alia by her political enemies.

name: Code Atreides
description: The House Atreides laws and codex of honor and conduct.

name: Cogitor
description: One of several ancient philosophers whose brains were transplanted into fluid-filled canisters so that they could analyze the universe indefinitely.

name: Coif
description: a close-fitting cap worn by the Bene Gesserit.

name: Cold Air Walls
description: artificial boundary created by ixian machines, enclosing the Sareer.

name: ComNet or Communinet
description: planetary communications network.

name: Cone of silence
description: a field or zone wherein the sound of the human voice was electronically distorted so that recording and amplifying devices could not reproduce it effectively or clearly.

name: Coriolis storm
description: Sandstorms on Arrakis in which winds across the open flatlands were amplified by the planet's own revolutionary motion to reach speeds up to 700 kilometres per hour.

name: Corrin
description: a planet near the star Sigma Draconis which gave the name the Battle of Corrin and the House Corrino.

name: Corrin, Battle of
description: the Battle which led to House Corrino ascending to the Throne.

name: Cousines or Imperial Cousines
description: Household members related to the emperor.

name: Crusher
description: Military space vessels composed of many smaller vessels locked together and designed to fall on an enemy position, crushing it.

name: Cryologic tank
description: containers for cryptoprezervation of dead human flesh.

name: The Crypt
description: a section of Leto Atreides II citadel in which his Duncan Idaho gholas and deceased members of his Atreides-breeding program were entombed.

name: Crysknife
description: Weapon made from the tooth of a sandworm from Arrakis.

name: Cueshma
description: fremen term for a "twenty-klick wind".

name: Cutterray
description: Short-range version of a lasgun, primarily used as a cutting tool.

name: Cymek
description: Type of cyborg, or machine-human hybrid, used during the Butlerian Jihad.

name: Dao
description: the terran predecessor of the Tau.Also referring to the Bene gesserit prana-bindu dormancy-trance.

name: Dar-es-Balat
description: Ancient place, one of the first no-chambers which contained the Lost Journey of Leto Atreides II the God-Emperor. Later in Heretics of Dune it became a museum in the care of Priesthood of the Divided God.

name: Dar al-hikman
description: a School of religious translation or interpretation.

name: Dark things
description: referring to discarded pre-ecumenic thoughts and writings.Also the Bene Gesserit Arcana.

name: Death Commandos
description: a type of military who is alltime ready and prepared to give up his life in a suicidal mission or attack.Especially referring to the Sardaukar and Fedaykin.

name: Death tripod
description: originally, the tripod upon which desert executioners hanged their victims. By usage: the three members of a cherem sworn to destroy their enemy.

name: Deathstill
description: Fremen device used to extract all moisture from a living or dead human or creature.

name: Demibrothers
description: Demibrothers are the biological sons of different Concubines in the same household and certified as having the same father.

name: Demiurge
description: a person who stands next to God.In Fremen mythology the Shai-Hulud was identified with the Demiurge.Paul Atreides likened himself to the Demiurge, while Leto seems to have adressed or interpreted his father's reign as the Demiurge.

name: Derch
description: "right turn".A command among the Sandriders.

name: Desert of Zan
description: a place from Zenzunni Mythology, place of their Zensunni ancestors legendary first trial.

name: Desposyni
description: the Desposyni were the descendants of Paul Atreides and their caliphate in the oral tradition of Arrakis.

name: Dew collector or dew precipitator
description: A small, egg-shaped device that uses a special surface to collect morning dew on the desert planet of Arrakis.

name: Dew gatherer
description: workers who reap dew from the plants of Arrakis, using a scythelike dew reaper.

name: Dhyana
description: Dhyana was a term for a spice-induced internal reality such as that grasped by Leto Atreides on his flight through the Tanzerouft.

name: Dictum familia
description: the rule of the Great Convention which prohibited the slaying of a royal person or member of a Great House by informal treachery. The rule set up the formal outline, limits the means of assassination.

name: Digit mill
description: an Ixian apparition used to sensitize and strenghten fingers or toes.

name: Dishdasha
description: a long-sleeved garment similar to a robe worn over a stillsuit.

name: Disputation of Armistead and Leandgrah
description: a mummer's play popular in Arrakeen in 10,216.

name: Distrans
description: Device for producing a temporary neural imprint on the nervous system of Chiroptera (bats) or birds.  The creature's normal cry then carried the message imprint which could be sorted from that carrier wave by another distrans.

name: Divan
description: a piece of couch-like sitting furniture or box-spring based bed.

name: Djeballa
description: a kind of hooded robe of the Fremen worn with a mouth-seal.

name: Djedida
description: the Djedidas were new-towns built after the rise of Muad'dib.They were built on foundations of exposed basalt and consisted of a townhall, lesser buildings, mushtamal-gardens and walls of brick or mud.

name: Doorseal
description: A portable plastic seal used in temporary camps to keep moisture from escaping.

name: Drugs
description: all substances which has a physiological effect when ingested or otherwise introduced into the body.

name: Drum sand
description: a composition of sand compaction producing a rhythmical beat after being impacted.

name: Dump box
description: unpiloted cargo containers designed to dump material directly from low orbit onto a planet's surface.

name: Dune hawk
description: a type of Desert hawk native to Arrakis.Also a type of Flyer or Ornithopter.

name: Dune men
description: a colloquial term used to describe men who worked among the sand dunes of the planet Arrakis collecting the Spice Melange, the sand workers and spice hunters.

name: Dur
description: a jungle planet in the Scattering.

name: Dust chasm
description: any deep crevasse or depression on the desert of Arrakis that has been filled with dust.Also a weather phenomenon.

name: D-Wolf
description: Wolf-like creatures bred by God Emperor to guard the Forbidden Forest around his Keep. The creatures were said to be a hybrid of gaze hounds and wolves.

name: Ecaz
description: the fourth planet orbiting Alpha centauri B.Home to several exotic plants such as Sapho, Elacca , Fogwood, and of the hufuf  vine .

name: Ecumenism
description: the unity among religions.

name: Ego-likeness
description: An extremely detailed portrait played through a shigawire projector capable of showing subtle movements said to convey the ego essence of a one or more persons.

name: Egret
description: a long extinct species of bird with pink plumage.

name: Elacca drug
description: Narcotic formed by burning the blood-grained elacca wood of Ecaz. The drug's effect was to remove most of the will to self-preservation; commonly used to prepare slave gladiators for the ring.

name: Elacca rope
description: rope made of the fine fibres of elacca wood.

name: Elacca whip
description: a weapon made of Elacca rope, used by the fishspeakers.

name: El-sayal
description: fremen term meaning "the 'rain of sand".

name: Elf-silk
description: a very fine and exquisite silk such as preferred by the great houses for clothing.

name: Enfeil
description: a Planet conquered during Muad'dib's Jihad.

name: Engineering
description: The complex manipulation of human society.Genetic,Political or Religious engineering.

name: Erg
description: a broad, flat area of desert covered with wind-swept sand with little or no vegetative cover.

name: Evermind
description: Pseudonym of Omnius.

name: Face dancers
description: Tleilaxu created creatures able to mimic other humans exactly and go undetected by all known means.

name: Face flaps
description: parts of a stillsuit's face mask, protecting it's wearer from fine dust.

name: Fai
description: the "water tribute", or principal form of taxation on Arrakis in the 102nd century BG.

name: False Wall West
description: a curving arm of rock that formed a barrier between the Habanya Erg to the east and the great sink of the Cielago Depression to the west.

name: Famine Times
description: The centuries following the death of Leto Atreides II, the God Emperor. Marked by chaos and famine on many worlds, and led to The Scattering.

name: Fanmetal
description: a kind of metal formed by the growing of jasmium crystals in duraluminum; noted for extreme tensile strength in relationship to weight.

name: Faufreluches
description: the rigid imperial system of class stratification.

name: Favrashi
description: a term used by Leto II to describe the soul, collective unconscious, source of archetypes and repository of all trauma and joy.

name: Fedaykin
description: Fremen death commandos, personally trained by Paul Atreides; historically: a group formed and pledged to give their lives to right a wrong.

name: Filmbook
description: an apparatus used mainly for training consisting of a shigawire imprint carrying a mnemonic pulse.

name: Filt-plug
description: part of a stillsuit worn to collect moisture from exhaled air.

name: Fiqh
description: a Chakobsa term meaning "law" or "knowledge".In Fremen Belief "Fiqh" was one of the mystical origins of their Zensunni forefathers faith.

name: Fire, pillar of
description: a simple pyrocket for signaling across the open desert. Also a manifestation of god.

name: First moon
description: the major satellite of Arrakis:Krelln.

name: Fish Speakers
description: All-female military force created by Leto Atreides II to enforce his rule over the Known Universe.

name: Floater Chair
description: a piece of furniture which was part of a sietch- quarter, presumably a chair which floated via suspensor-technology.

name: Fogwood
description: Wood native to Ecaz, capable of being shaped in situ by thought alone.

name: Foum al-hout
description: the southern pole-star of Arrakis.

name: Franzk
description: an old-terran language which presumably had contributed some to Galach, notably terms and names such as "melange".

name: Free traders
description: idiomatic term for Smugglers.

name: Fremen
description: 'Native' inhabitants of Arrakis.

name: Fremen robe
description: a loose, patched type of robe worn by the Fremen over a stillsuit.

name: Fremkit
description: Desert survival kit of Fremen manufacture.

name: Frigate
description: a class of Starship.The largest space-faring vessel that could successfully land and take off from a planet's surface in one piece.

name: Funeral plains
description: the empty lifeless wilderness south of Sietch Tabr.

name: Futar
description: Primitive and fierce artificial humanoid creatures created by the Bene Tleilax, a genetic mix of man and cat.

name: Gabriel
description: the herald of God who blows his horn to announce Judgment Day.

name: Galach
description: Official language of the Imperium.

name: Galacia
description: a Planet of the empire.

name: Gamont
description: The third planet of the Niushe system.

name: Gara Rulen
description: a settlement on Arrakis.

name: Gare or Gara
description: Fremen for a peak or height.

name: Gare Ruden
description: a rebel sietch on Arrakis.

name: Gathering
description: 1.the formal convocation of Fremen leaders to witness a combat that determines tribal leadership.2. A Zensunni practice of introspection. 3. The formal council of a Bene Gesserit School. 4.The Bene Gesserit Practice of concentrating inner strength.

name: Gehenna
description: the realm of Shaitan.

name: Generalist
description: Rank of a Mentat who had acknowledged to understand that anything which we can identify as our universe is merely part of larger phenomena.

name: Geyrat
description: straight ahead; a worm steersman's call.

name: Ghafla
description: giving oneself up to gadfly distractions. Thus; a changeable person, one not to be trusted..

name: Ghanima
description: Fremen term for a spoil of war.

name: Ghola
description: Clone grown in an Axlotl tanks from genetic material retrieved from the cells of a deceased subject.In Fremen Mythology an undead Demon , a Ghoul.

name: Giedi prime
description: Planet orbiting Ophiuchi B.Home of House Harkonnen.

name: Gila Woodpecker
description: a bird home to Arrakis.

name: Ginaz, house
description: A House and school of Swordmasters.

name: Giudichar
description: a holy truth. (Commonly seen in the expression Giudichar mantene: an original and supporting truth.)

name: Glowglobe
description: Suspensor-buoyed illuminating device, self-powered by harnessing the extra energy channeled by the Holtzman effect.

name: God
description: the Highest being or will of the Universe , or any entity revered by the various religions of the empire as likeness of the Highest Being.

name: Golden Age of Earth
description: a time of Myth in which Mankind still inhabited only their native homeworld Earth.

name: Golden Elixir of life
description: the religion of Emperor Paul Muad'Dib.

name: Golden Path
description: Paul Atreides and Leto II's strategy to prevent humanity's ultimate extinction.

name: Gom Jabbar
description: Specific poison needle tipped with meta-cyanide used by the Bene Gesserit in their 'death-alternative test of human awareness.' It was called 'the high-handed enemy.'

name: Goygoa
description: small pastoral village built on former Jacurutu.

name: Graben
description: a long geological ditch formed when the ground sinks because of movements in the underlying crustal layers.

name: Great Belief
description: Tleilaxu religion consists from two ancient religious sects, Zensunni and Sufi.

name: Great Convention
description: Universal truce enforced under the power balance maintained by the Spacing Guild, the Great Houses, and the Imperium.  Its chief rule prohibits the use of atomics against human targets.

name: Great Hall
description: the imperial audience chamber of Arrakeen palace.

name: Great mother
description: 1. The female principle of space 2. In Bene Gesserit terminology a lead gene-carrier.

name: Great revolt
description: the Butlerian Jihad.

name: Greeks
description: an ancient culture of old earth, supposedly ancestors of House Atreides.

name: Gridex plane
description: a differential-charge separator used to remove sand from the melange spice mass; a device of the second stage in spice refining.

name: Grumman
description: a planet of the Imperium, home to House Moritani.

name: Guild
description: the Spacing Guild.

name: Guild Bank
description: the financial arm of the Spacing Guild.

name: Guild courier
description: a Guild agent trained and authorized to deliver personal shipments.Usually a person with some lesser-level Mentat-training.

name: Guild Key
description: a cypher used by the Guild go translate the Stolen Journals and later the Dar-es-Balat hoard.

name: Guild Navigator
description: Melange-mutated humans safely able to navigate interstellar space in Heighliners through prescience.

name: Guild Ship
description: any spacecraft maintained by the spacing guild, but usually large starships meant to transport smaller inter-planetary vessels.

name: Habbanya
description: a region on Arrakis northern hemisphere including both a mountain ridge and an a part of the  Erg.

name: Hadith
description: a type of Song in Fremen Culture.Also a placename on Arrakis, a location of a Harkonnen spice-hoard as well as a Sietch name.

name: Hadji
description: religious pilgrims travelling to Arrakis to visit the home of the messiah Muad'Dib.

name: Hagal
description: also known as the "Jewel Planet", the second planet of the Theta Shaowei star system.

name: Haiiiii-Yoh!
description: command to action; worm-steersman's call.

name: Hajj
description: originally the spiritual journey of the Fremen, later the missionary arm of thr Church of Muad'dib.Hajj would refer to Fremen reaching out from Arrakis into the known Universe as well as to Out-freyn Pilgrims from other worlds coming to Arrakis.

name: Hajra
description: the Zensunni journey of seeking; a migration to find a place to live as well as a holy journey of mind, body, and spirit to find wisdom and or enlightenment.

name: Hal yawm
description: A Fremen exclamation loosely translated as "Now! At last!".

name: Handlers
description: Humanoid race who bred and trained Futars to hunt Honored Matres.

name: Harj
description: fremen term for a desert journey or migration.

name: Harmonthep
description: a planet orbiting the star Delta Pavonis. According to legend the sixth stop in the Zensunni Wanderers' migration.

name: Harpies
description: mythical shadow demons lying in ambush.

name: Harvester (also Harvester Factory or Crawler)
description: Large (often 120 metres by 40 metres) spice mining machine with a buglike body on independent tracks.

name: Headband of mourning
description: a ceremonial haedpiece made of braided spice-fibre worn by the Fremen for funeral and memorial ceremonies.

name: Heighliner
description: Enormous carrier spaceships used by the Spacing Guild for interstellar travel.

name: Heinali
description: the "manpusher", a hundred-klick wind.

name: Hiereg
description: Fremen term for a desert camp.

name: High council
description: the Landsraad inner circle.

name: High Monitors
description: ixian observance satellites used to supervise the Sareer.

name: Holtzman Effect
description: Scientific phenomenon that makes (among other things) instantaneous space travel and defensive force shields possible.

name: The Holy Metamorphosis
description: a Book by Harq al-Harba, also a doctrine of the Rakian Priesthood considering the two transformations of the God-Emperor.

name: Honored Matres
description: Matriarchal order formed in The Scattering, by Bene Gesserit,Fishspeakers and Female Tleilaxu, who used sexual imprinting and violence to subdue and control their enemies.

name: Hookman
description: Any Fremen with Maker hooks prepared to catch a sandworm.

name: Horns-of-the-Worm
description: a Fremen handsign used to ward off Rihani magic.

name: Hour of Assassins
description: the first hour before dawn.

name: Houri
description: a virgin of god.

name: House
description: a Noble imperial or planetary family.

name: House major
description: an imperial House ruling a Planet.

name: House minor
description: planet-bound families subject to a House major.

name: House Proctor
description: a lawyer or other official in service of a House or a Reverend Mother in service of a specific House.

name: House Ferrets
description: watchful small animals held by the planetary houses to Alert from any intruders and ward off harmful vermin, especially 'infectious Agents'.

name: Huanui-nau
description: a Deathstill.

name: Hulasikali Wala
description: fremen name for the Coriolis storm.

name: Hunter-seeker
description: Ravening sliver of suspensor-buoyed metal guided as a weapon by a nearby control console, commonly used for assassination. Floating in mid-air, it kills by entering the body and following nerve pathways to vital organs.

name: Ibad
description: "Lost ones"; originally a tribe of the Nilotic al-Ourouba, later used figuratively for the deep blue eyes of the Fremen or other Melange adicts, caused by the spice-saturation of the adicts blood.

name: Ibid
description: implying a quotation, short for Latin ibidem, meaning "in the same place".Someone who became another one's "Ibid" only still exists as a quotation, i.e. in a truncated or abbreviated, and possibly decontextualized form.

name: Ibn qirtaiba
description: see qirtaiba

name: Ichwan
description: a band of brothers.Used for the brotherhood of the Ichwan-Bedwines, the tribal communion of all Fremen on Arrakis.

name: Idaho river
description: a river on Rakis, in the place of the former Mount Idaho.

name: Iduali
description: blood drinking "water-insects";  a mythical Fremen tribe once outlawed for taking the water of fellow Fremen.

name: Ijaz
description: Described as "The inimitibility of the prophecy". A term used by the Missionaria Protectiva to describe a prophecy they have planted on a planet as unique, and unable to be copied. Lady Jessica uses this term to describe the Fremen prophecy of the Mahdi that was planted on Arrakis.

name: Ikhut-eigh!
description: the cry of the water-sellers on Arrakis.The etymology is uncertain.

name: Imperial Citadel
description: Leto II's great dwelling in the Sareer.

name: Ilm
description: fremen term for theology.

name: Imperial conditioning
description: a development of the Suk Medical Schools.The highest conditioning against taking human life, which meant that a Suk Doctor who had this conditioning could even serve an Emperor.

name: Imprinter
description: A Reverend Mother, who achieved to master three hundred steps of orgasmic amplification, assigned to condition any potential or important male via sexual imprinting.

name: Infectious agent
description: a Virus or microscopic one-celled organism aimed intended as a biological weapon against a specific Victim or group of human Targets.Also figuratively the human or animal carrier of such a biological weapon.

name: Inkvine
description: Creeping plant native to Giedi Prime and frequently used as a whip in its slave pens. Victims were marked by beet-colored tattoos that caused residual pain for many years.

name: Inquisitor
description: A judge or official inquisiting heresies.During and after the butlerian Jihad Inquisitors were represetants of the Orange-Catholic Orthodoxy who pursued violations of the great Convention.During the Atreides empire the Inquisitors usually were Members of the Qizarate who persecuted dissenters from the Golden Elixir of Life religion. Under Leto II similar tasks were performed by the Fishspeakers of the Bureau of Faith.

name: Isis Cult
description: an ancient terran religion revering the demon-goddess of death.The Cult was revived by a group of Heretics during the reign of Leto II.

name: Isnad
description: among the Fremen a convention of a tribe in which was hold justice on another member of the tribe.

name: Istislah
description: The Fremen rule of general interest. Everything is done in the general interest of the tribe, not the individual.

name: Itinerant priest
description: a member of the Church of Muad'dib travelling with a group of Pilgrims, settlers,Suks or Jihadis , spreading the golden Elixir of life religion throughout the known Universe.

name: Ix
description: the ninth planet in the star system Alkalurops,ruled by the Ixian Technocracy.Ixian economy depended on manufacturing complex machinery, sometimes flouting the moral-juridical proscriptions of the great convention.

name: Ixian amplifyer
description: microscopic amplifiers of ixian make used by Leto II on his royal cart to amplify his voice on processions.

name: Ixian Core
description: the heartland of the technological federation goverened by Ix.

name: Ixian damper
description: Device used to prevents eavesdropping from outside functioning area.

name: Ixian dictatel
description: a microscopic voice- and thought-recording printer, imprinting on ridulian crystal-paper.

name: Ixian globe
description: a precursor or early type of no-room.A mechanical device ,invisible, emitting radiation and absorbing radiation to simulate the natural character of its surroundings,

name: Ixian mask
description: 1. A type of ixian-made black gauze-mask, presumably mechanical, enabling a blind man to see. 2. A movable transparent type of slide-wall used to keep insects away.

name: Ixian Masters
description: the Ixian-confederacy's ruling class or technocrat-elite.

name: Ixian navigator
description: Mechanical substitution for a Guild Navigator. It was used in every no-ships and in some of Guild heighliners.

name: Ixian probe
description: Device used to capture the thoughts of a person (living or dead) for analysis; could be blocked by the substance shere.

name: Ixian tools
description: otherwisely unnamed type of specific ixian machinery used for detection and tunneling of underground-facilities.

name: Ixian tube-lift
description: large transportation systems, similar to vacuum elevators, used by Leto II for traveling his imperial Citadel.

name: Jacob  Broom
description: a Politician and Businessman of Old Earth.He was one of the many historical personalities who were alive in Leto II Consciousness.The sentence "Control the courts and the coinage -let the rabble have the rest"  was attributed to him.

name: Jadacha
description: 'The Legs of thights'.A Jadacha-hermaphrodit as the Face Dancers was a person who was of no physical or mental sex and gender who could willingly change it's physics to imitate a person of any sex and gender.

name: Jalalud-Din
description: a settlement on Arrakis near the great gap in the shield wall.

name: Janus
description: a bearded two-faced roman god from old earth.During Alia's reign Atreides Statues depicting Leto and Alia were designed to resemble images of Janus in Style.

name: Jihad
description: the ultimate goal or strife.Often referring to the Butlerian Jihad or the Fremen Holy war.

name: Jihad, butlerian
description: the great revolt against thinking machines and machine culture.

name: John Baptist
description: a prophet of old earth revered in Christianity and First Islam and remembered in Orange Catholicism.

name: John Bartlett
description: a scholar from of old terra known for his collection of famous quotes.

name: Johnnies
description: an arrakisian term for "Outsiders" or inexperienced people from off-world.

name: Jowf
description: a place on old earth ,possibly near Assyria,Conquered by Sennacherib, .The priestesses of Jowf were ancestors of the Bene Gesserit.

name: Jubba
description: an all-purpose cloak commonly worn over a stillsuit on Arrakis.

name: Judge of the change
description: an Imperial officer who was charged with presiding over a change of planetary Fief, declarations and forms of kanly, or War of Assassins during the days of the Imperium. A Judge's authority could only be challenged before the High Council.

name: Kadesh
description: a planet, home of Tagir Mohandis, the troubadour.

name: Kadrish
description: a planet far from Arrakis where it had become fashion to wear imitated stillsuits.

name: Kagga Basin
description: a region on Arrakis close to Arrakeen.

name: Kairitis
description: a Bene Gesserit discipline to judge ones self assurance.A discipline without words or phrases, rules or laws.

name: Leb Kamai
description: "Heart of the uprise" .A mythical place, possibly originally referring to Chaldea or Babylonia on old Earth.

name: Kanly
description: Formal feud or vendetta under the rules of the Great Convention carried on according to the strictest limitations. Originally the rules were designed to protect innocent bystanders.

name: Karakul
description: a black wool made from the wool of the Karakul sheep.

name: Karama
description: A miracle; an action intiated by the spirit world.

name: Kaymakam
description: title for a political governor during Paul Muad'dib and Alia's rule

name: Kaza
description: fremen term for the appointed leader of a group

name: Kedem  or Kadem
description: the Fremen word for Arrakis' inner desert.

name: Keeper of Jessica's Light
description: Title of the High-Priestess of the renewed Cult of Alia on Gammu.

name: Keffiya
description: the knotted headdress worn by a Fremen Naib.

name: Ke'leb
description: an archaic word for Dog as in the saying "to know the difference between Ze'eb and Ke'leb".A Ke'leb was a person without any true power and as such unable to abuse it.

name: Ketman
description: fremen term for the concept of Taquiyya.

name: Khala
description: Traditional invocation to still the angry spirits of a place you mention.

name: Killer medic
description: a Physician trained as an Assassin.Killer medics were the Tleilaxu Antithesis of Suk-doctors and of course did not have an imperial conditioning.

name: Kindjal
description: a two-edged shortblade or Knife used commonly in shield-fighting.

name: Kiswa
description: Any figure or design from Fremen mythology.

name: Kitab Al-Ibar
description: The combined survival handbook/religious manual developed by the Fremen on Arrakis

name: Koan
description: A Zen-Mindbreaker.In Zensunni Philosophy usually a self-contradicting statement, riddle or oxymoron.

name: Kontar
description: a unit of measure.Once one and a half kontar limited a camel load.

name: Kralizec
description: Long-foretold final battle or 'typhoon struggle at the end of the universe.'

name: Krimskell fibre
description: a fibre made of the Hufuf vine of Ecaz.Often used to bind and strap prisoners.

name: Krimskell rope
description: a rope made of Krimskell fibre, often used by Troopers for crowd-control and to capture potential convicts.

name: Kull wahad
description: an old saying often used in the way of " I am surprised!"

name: Kulon
description: a domesticated desert-ass descending from the wild terran asian steppe ass.Kulons wore usually stillsuits manufactured specially for these animals and were often used by smugglers.

name: Kwisatz Haderach
description: "The Shortening of the Way." This is the label applied by the Bene Gesserit to the unknown for which the sought a genetic solution: a male Bene Gesserit whose organic mental powers would bridge space and time. After the reign of Leto II, the Tyrant, this label became applied to all persons whom the Bene Gesserit thought to be of unnatural/supernatural power that could drastically change the balance of power in the known universe. ( See also Leto Atreides II, Paul Atreides, Hasimir Fenring, Duncan Idaho, Miles Teg)

name: Kynes Sea
description: a vast ocean on later terra-formed Arrakis lying beyond the Sareer.

name: La,la,la
description: a Fremen cry of grief ("La" translates as ultimate denial, a “no” from which you cannot appeal.)

name: Landing-lip
description: an extendable landing strip for smaller vessels such as Thopters or small spacecrafts.

name: Landsraad
description: The Assembly of all nobles in the Imperium.

name: Lasgun
description: Energy weapon, technically a continuous-wave laser projector.

name: L-ray
description: The ray emitted from the explosion of stone burner that can cause blindness with direct contact to the eye.

name: Laza tiger
description: Big hybrid feline on Salusa Secundus

name: Legion, imperial
description: a large fighting force of approximately 40,000 men, either Imperial Sardaukar or Conscripts of the Great Houses.

name: Liban
description: spice water infused with yucca flour. Originally a sour milk drink of the Fremen.

name: Lida
description: an old unit of measure.Originally a camel load or two thirds of one Kontar.

name: Life scanner
description: ixian machines for detection of life signals on a planet or a specific area.The Scanners rays could be blocked by specific algae which were used as living protection shields.

name: Life shield blanket
description: Device used to shield life signal inside the shielding area from life tracing.

name: Lisan al-gaib
description: "The Voice from the Outer World".Originally the Fremen term for an off-world prophet or Mahdi outlined in Fremen messianic legends later heavily influenced by the Bene Gesserit's Missionaria Protectiva.

name: Lisanu L'haqq
description: the "language of truth" or true voice of Al-Mutakallim.

name: Literjon
description: a one-liter container for transporting water on Arrakis; made of high-density, shatterproof plastic with positive seal.

name: Little Citadel
description: a vantage tower in the central Sareer built bY Leto II.

name: Little maker
description: Fremen term for the Sandtrout or half-plant-half-animal deep-sand vector of the Arrakis sandworm.

name: Long Koan
description: the great Zensunni mindbreaker or accurate prediction of future.

name: Lost Tleilaxu
description: Offshoot race of the Bene Tleilax, formed in The Scattering.

name: Machinery inspector
description: a class of Imperial clerks, more privileged than common energy-workers but not part of the Fishspeaker ranks.

name: Mahdi
description: the savior or messiah of Fremen theology.

name: Mahdi religion
description: the Golden Elixir of Life Religion of Muad'Dib as established by the Church of Muad'Dib.Also Alia's Mahdinate.

name: Mahdi spirit cultists
description: a superstitious offshot of the Mahdi-Religion which revered Muad'Dib's spirit after his presumed death.An inofficial sect tolerated by Alia's priesthood but existing outside the official Church.

name: Mahdinate
description: the Title of Alia's regency as formal successor of Muad'Dib.

name: Majordomo
description: the God Emperor Leto's highest official and personal confidante.

name: Maker
description: Fremen term for the Sandworms, sub-categorized into "little Makers" and Shai-Hulud.

name: Maker Hook
description: long, narrow shafts of metal with a hook on the end used by the Fremen for capturing, mounting and steering the Sandworms.

name: Maku?
description: a Fremen exclamation.Possibly relating to the mythical "place of magicians" on Old Earth.

name: Management bureaucracy
description: the administrative class within all historical societies including monarchy.

name: Mantene
description: the first principle ,underlying wisdom or supporting argument. (See Giudichar.)

name: Maometh
description: the third Muhammed, the Prophet of Buddislam.

name: Masshad
description: fremen term for a spiritual-test.

name: Master of the Deathstills
description: a tribal rank in every Fremen Sietch overseeing the Sietches Deathstill.

name: Mating index
description: the Bene Gesserit master record of its human breeding program aimed at producing the Kwisatz Haderach.

name: Maula
description: a Slave.The unfree, planet-bound class without any personal rights.

name: Maula pistol
description: Spring-loaded gun for firing poison darts, with a range of about 40 metres.

name: Maulana
description: a rank or office among the Qizarate.

name: Medic
description: 1. Any trained physician 2. A "House Medic", of the personal Physician of a Great Houses family.Usually a Suk-Doctor.

name: Melange
description: Drug that was essential to space travel and extended life, and therefore to the survival of the universe.

name: 'mektub al mellah'
description: "The thing was written with salt", a Fremen proverb.

name: Melange Wafers
description: small wafers of concentrated Melange.Overdoses could lead to suicidal berzerker-like rage, a tactic that was sometimes used by the Sardaukar.Wafers with only a slight Melange dose were used by the Fishspeakers during their Siaynoq.

name: Memerase paper
description: a type of fine paper fit for containing large amounts of miniaturized script information.

name: Memocorder
description: a tiny handheld device of Ixian origin that could store written messages.

name: Mentat
description: Individuals trained as human computers, their minds developed to staggering heights of cognitive and analytical ability.

name: Merchant Engineers
description: a class of respected planetary intelligentsia.

name: Merchant-priests
description: the class of temple-merchants selling off cheap religious accessoired to Pilgrims, also idiomatic for Priests who sell religion like a common ware to gain personal prestige and power.

name: Message-Capsule
description: small containers intended for transport of sealed personal messages.

name: Metaglass
description: glass grown as a high-temperature gas infusion in sheets of jasmium quartz. Noted for extreme tensile strength (about 450,000 kilos per square centimeter at two centimeters' thickness) and capacity as a selective radiation filter.

name: microbubble
description: an archaic system of storing sound-recordings.

name: Mihna
description: the season for testing Fremen youths who wish admittance to manhood.

name: Minimic film
description: shigawire of one-micron diameter often used to transmit espionage and counterespionage data.

name: Mirabhasa
description: principles of the Bhotani philosophy, meaning "rationalism".Also mirabhasa languages, created after the Mirabhasa principles, honed phlange consonants and joined vowels used as an instrument for conveying fine emotional subtleties.

name: Mirzabah
description: the Iron Hammer with which the dead are beaten who cannot reply satisfactorily to the questions they must answer before entry into paradise.

name: Mish-Mish
description: Apricots.

name: Misr
description: the historical Zensunni(Fremen) term for themselves: "The People."

name: Missionaria Protectiva
description: An arm of the Bene Gesserit charged with spreading contrived myths, prophecies and superstition on primitive worlds so that the Bene Gesserit may later exploit those regions.

name: Mjeed
description: a ruling-title from old Terra.Translated as "Superior".

name: Mnemonic amplifier
description: a learning-device used to train and strengthen memorization.

name: Mnemonic flutter-system
description: an attachement used with a shigawire projector to internalize large amounts of data.

name: Mohalata
description: among the Fremen the term for a protective partnership.Among the Bene Gesserit the partnership one of the pre-born can have with benign ancestors to protect him from malignant ancestors.

name: Moisture seal
description: a door or dome used to preserve bodymoisture.

name: Moisture trap
description: a waterproof sheath for collecting condensed dew.

name: Molitor Victory
description: an important Battle during Muad'Dib's Jihad,,probably named after a Planet or System.

name: Monitor
description: a ten-section space warcraft mounting heavy armor and shield protection. It is designed to be separated into its component sections for lift-off after planet-fall.

name: Mother of moisture
description: the Fremen title for the mother of the Mahdi or Lisan al Gaib.

name: Mouthseal
description: a device for preserving mouth-moisture worn with a Djeballa-hood.

name: Muad'dib
description: the adapted kangaroo mouse of Arrakis, a creature associated in the Fremen earth-spirit mythology with a design visible on the planet's second moon. This creature was admired by Fremen for its ability to survive in the open desert.

name: Mudir nahya
description: the Fremen name for Beast Rabban (Count Rabban of Lankiveil), the Harkonnen cousin who was siridar governor on Arrakis for many years. The name was often translated as "Demon Ruler."

name: Mufti
description: the garb, cap and gown,  of a Priest or House-trooper off-duty.

name: Muritan
description: a Planet where a Battle was fought during the late years of Muad'Dib's Jihad.

name: Museum Fremen
description: A class of lower citizens on Rakis during the Empire of Leto II.Degenerate descendants of the Fremen who inhabited restricted precincts of the Planet uncontaminated by offworld-technology as living museums of Fremen culture to educate visitors.

name: Mushtamal
description: a small garden annex to a Fremen djedida, the term was imported from Ishkal.

name: Musky
description: poison in a drink. (See Chaumurky.)

name: Mu zein wallah!
description: Mu zein literally meant "nothing good," and wallah was a reflexive terminal exclamation. In this traditional opening for a Fremen curse against an enemy, Wallah turned the emphasis back upon the words Mu zein, producing the meaning: "Nothing good, never good, good for nothing."

name: Na-Baron
description: Noble title given to a Baron's heir-apparent.

name: Naib
description: Caretaker and Leader of Sietch. The word means 'Servant of Sietch' in Chakobsa.

name: Naraj Worlds
description: a Group of Planets or a system comquered during Muad'Dibs Jihad.During the Conquest the Defendants made use of Stoneburners.

name: Navigation machines
description: Thinking machines used to steer Spaceships during hyperspace travel.They were used prior to the rise of the Spacing Guilds mutated Navigators and later were banned and forgotten abput until improved navigation machines were developed by the Ixians after Leto II which ultimately broke the Guilds monopoly.

name: Nebiros
description: a House Minor during Alias regency trading in holy artefacts and small manufactured items for decoration.

name: Needle knife
description: a type of Tool and weapon worn by the Fremen.

name: Nezhoni scarf
description: a scarf-pad worn on the forehead, beneath a stillsuit, by Fremen women who had given birth to a son and who were married or romantically attached.

name: Niazi
description: a place of saltmines on Arrakis.

name: Nightseal
description: or "Nightshield".Part of a Fremkit, a device enabling to get under cover in darkness in the desert.

name: No-chamber or No-room
description: Construct that hid anything inside from prescient and ocular vision, as well as other methods of detection.

name: No-ship
description: No-chamber in spaceship form, with enough limited prescience to be capable of interstellar travel without a Guild Navigator.

name: Noah Arkwright
description: A Philosopher and historian.Presumably a Pseudonym of Leto II.

name: Non-absolutum, Ultimate, the
description: Bene Gesserit term for nature in all of her manifestations and changes.

name: Noukker
description: an officer 8f the imperial Guard and  traditional rank for sons and daughters of the royal concubines.Noukkers were known for their extreme height and body size.

name: Novice
description: 1. An aspirant Bene Gesserit sister 2. A Sayyadina.

name: Nullentropy
description: Technology through which the natural processes of time, such as decomposition, were ceased. In this way, matter such as human cells was stored for millennia without damage.

name: Obliterators
description: Honored Matre weapons of mass destruction. They combusted the atmosphere of a planet and subsequently its surface.

name: Oil lens
description: Hufuf-Oil held in tension in an enclosing force field, used as an optical component.

name: Opafire
description: one of the rare opaline jewels of Hagal.

name: Oracle
description: 1. a person with prescience, especially persons of the Spacing Guild or the Bene Gesserit.2. the mythical gift and philosophical mystery of prescience as such.3. Alia as the Oracle of Muad'Dib.

name: Orange Catholic Bible
description: also known as the Koranjiyana Zenchristian Scriptures, the Accumulated Book, or the Zenchristian Navakoran, was one of the most important religious texts in the known universe.

name: Orange catholic ritual
description: the rite of communion among the followers of the fourteen sages in which the believers shared a wafer sybolising the flesh of god.

name: Order of Hormu
description: An organization of Honored Matres' playfems.

name: Other Memory
description: The combined ego and memories of all female ancestors that a Bene Gesserit was trained to access.

name: Ornithopter (or 'Thopter)
description: Aircraft capable of sustained wing-beat flight in the manner of birds.

name: Out-freyn
description: Galach for "immediately foreign," that is: not of your immediate community, not of the select.

name: Osiris
description: a deity from old Terra, brother and husband to Isis and dying god of rebirth.

name: Ovid
description: a poet of Old Earth whose works were long forgotten and who was only still remembered in some famous quotations.

name: Palato
description: an ancient ruler-title from the Old Empire or even Old Earth

name: Palm lock
description: Lock or seal which could be opened only by contact with the palm of the human hand to which it has been keyed.

name: Panoplia Propheticus
description: Common term for superstitions planted through the Known Universe by Missionaria Protectiva.

name: Pastaza
description: fremen term for a specific kind of breeze.

name: Phibian
description: Primitive, amphibious humanoid creatures, a genetic mix of man and fish.

name: Plasteel
description: Extremely tough form of steel, stabilized with stravidium fibers grown into its crystal structure.

name: Playfem
description: Short for Play Female, a word used to designate a type or class of prostitute.

name: Plaz (or windowplaz)
description: Synthetic glass, used for windows (especially in aircraft and spaceships) due to its superior strength.

name: Poison snooper
description: Radiation analyzer within the olfactory spectrum and keyed to detect poisonous substances.

name: Portyguls
description: Oranges.

name: Prajna
description: a Bene Gesserit meditation technique.

name: Prana-bindu
description: Prana for nerve and bindu for fibers. Training that provided a Bene Gesserit with complete muscle control (Prana nervature related to nervous system control), and the basis of the Weirding Way

name: Predator fish
description: Fishes that used to protect qanat from sandtrout.

name: Qadis as-Salaf
description: the holy fathers of Fremen mythology.

name: Qanat
description: Open canal for carrying irrigation water under controlled conditions through a desert.

name: Qirtaiba
description: derived from ""Ibn Qirtauba, "Thus go the holy words...." the formal beginning to Fremen religious incantation (derived from panoplia propheticus).

name: Rachag
description: a coffein-like stimulans extracted from the berries of the Arkaso.

name: Rebaba
description: a ten-string instrument of the Fremen.

name: Residual poison
description: Innovation whereby the body was impregnated with a substance for which repeated antidotes must be administered; withdrawal of the antidote at any time brought death.

name: Reverend Mother
description: Female Bene Gesserit who had survived a ritual wherein she consciously transformed a toxic dose of melange to a non-poisonous substance at the molecular level, thereby raising herself to a higher level of awareness and enabling her to access Other Memory.

name: Ridulian Crystal
description: Crystalline substance used to manufacture printing materials at the thickness of one molecule.

name: Rihani decipherment
description: decipherment used by the Bene Gessent to recognize a registered individual no matter what overt change in behavior or appearance he assumes Rihani decipherment also allowed sisters to unerringly identify Face Dancers and gholas, even when they assumed the appearance of individuals unknown to the Sister herself.The decipherment pattern also allowed them to discern the non-human characteristics.

name: Rihani magic
description: among the Fremen a mythical ancient form of forbidden sorcery or witchcraft.

name: Ruh-spirit
description: In Fremen belief, that part of the individual that is always rooted in and capable of sensing the metaphysical world.

name: Sadu
description: among the fremen the blessed company of heavenly judges.A Sadu presided over the traditional scales, which here weigh either the soul or the water rendered trom the dead, for the scales formed the T of the Tau.

name: Salusan bull
description: Fierce and very aggressive creature with multiple horns, used in bullfighting on Caladan and supposedly originating from Salusa Secundus.

name: Sand plankton
description: The first phase of Sandworm's life cycle before a Sandtrout vector. Thought to be Sandworm's food.

name: Sandtrout
description: Premature form of the Sandworm.

name: Sandworm
description: Giant sand-dwelling creatures native to Arrakis, essential to the production of melange.  Called Shai-Hulud by the Fremen and worshipped as deities.

name: Sapho
description: High-energy liquid extracted from barrier roots of Ecaz, commonly used by Mentats to amplify their mental powers. Users developed deep ruby stains on mouth and lips.

name: Sardaukar
description: Ferocious soldier-fanatics of the Padishah Emperors, later disbanded by Leto II.

name: Sarfa
description: the act of turning away from God

name: Sayyadina
description: Fremen tribal-priestesses, especially Acolytes and candidates for Fremen Reverend Mother.

name: The Scattering
description: Event after the reign of Leto II in which billions of people left the settled worlds of the Old Empire, striking off into unknown space.

name: Secher Nbiw
description: The Golden Path

name: Semboule
description: possibly a placename on Sembu, where the Semboule treaty was signed.

name: Sembu
description: planet conquered during Muad'Dib's Jihad.

name: Semuta
description: Second narcotic derivative (by crystal extraction) from the burned residue of elacca wood from Ecaz.  The effect (described as timeless, sustained ecstasy) was elicited by certain atonal vibrations referred to as semuta music.

name: Sennacherib
description: an ancient King of Assyria.He conquered or raided the priestesses of Jowf.

name: Sermon
description: a preacher's public oration on religious matters

name: Shaitan
description: Another name of sandworms of Arrakis which means Satan or Evil one.

name: Shai-Hulud
description: Fremen name for the sandworms of Arrakis.

name: Shere
description: Significant presence of this substance in the body blocked the use of an Ixian probe.

name: Shigawire
description: Metal extrusion of a ground vine (Narvi narviium) grown only on Salusa Secundus and III Delta Kaising, noted for extreme tensile strength and used as a recording medium (among other things).

name: Shari-a
description: Fremen believe in religious ritual.

name: Siaynoq
description: God Emperor's greatest ritual, sharing moment with his Fish Speakers, performed every ten years in the Festival City of Onn. In Heretics of Dune, 1500 years after the time of God Emperor, become a ritual dance in the City of Keen.

name: Sietch
description: Cave warren inhabited by a Fremen tribal community.

name: Sietch orgy (or sietch tau orgy)
description: Fremen ritual of unrestrained sexual indulgence which takes place after a Reverend Mother shares the changed Water of Life with her community.

name: Sihaya
description: A landscape of Sand-dunes on Arrakis, the name of the Recording Angel who interrogates the newly dead.Also Chani Kynes intimate name by Paul Atreides.

name: Sirat
description: the passage in the O.C. Bible that describes human life as a journey across a narrow bridge (the Sirat) with “Paradise on my right, Hell on my left, and the angel of death behind.

name: Slig
description: Livestock animal, hybrid of a large slug and a pig, bioengineered by the Bene Tleilax; To many the tender meat is a delicacy, though most consider the animal itself detestful.

name: Solido
description: Three-dimensional image generated from a solido projector using 360-degree reference signals imprinted on a shigawire reel.

name: Soostone
description: Valuable iridescent gem produced on Buzzell by the abraded carapaces of monoped sea creatures called Cholisters, much in the manner of pearls on Old Earth.

name: Spacing Guild
description: Powerful organization which ad a monopoly on space travel and transport due to their Navigators.

name: Spice agony
description: Fremen version of the ritual used by the Bene Gesserit to create Reverend Mothers, using the Water of Life instead of melange.

name: Spice Melange
description: Drug that was essential to space travel and extended life, and therefore to the survival of the universe.

name: Spice essence
description: Water of Life that has been changed to non-toxic form by Reverend Mother.

name: Sonics
description: Military units or technology for detection of underground facilities.

name: Steersman
description: Title given to Guild Navigators.Also the steersman of a Sandworm among the Fremen.

name: Stillsuit
description: Body-enclosing garment of Fremen design which performed the functions of heat dissipation and filtering bodily wastes, as well as retaining and reclaiming moisture.

name: Stone burner
description: Atomic weapon, the explosion and radiation of which could be precisely adjusted depending on the desired effect.

name: Sufi
description: Ancient Religious sect. Thought to be long lost but still survive in the form of part of the Great Belief.

name: Suk Inner School
description: Prestigious medical school whose Imperial Conditioning banned the taking of human life; initiates were marked by a diamond tattoo on the forehead and wore a silver Suk ring in their hair.

name: Suks
description: Imperial mercantile settlements and the culture of imperial traders.

name: Sukkar
description: most likely a place-name on Arrakis.

name: Suspensor
description: Any of a number of 'hovering' devices which utilized the secondary (low-drain) phase of a Holtzman field generator to nullify gravity within certain limits prescribed by relative mass and energy consumption.

name: Tahaddi al-burhan
description: an ultimate test from which there can be no appeal (usually because it brings death or destruction).

name: Tahaddi challenge
description: a Fremen challenge to mortal combat, usually over some primal issue, such as the desire for another man's wife, or if honour was insulted, or if leadership was challenged.

name: Taif
description: among the Fremen on Arrakis, a company of men held together by mutual self-interest.

name: Taquiyya
description: the practice of concealing the identity when revealing it might be harmful.Known among the Fremen as "Ketman".

name: Taqwa
description: Fremen term implying "Strong belief.Piety.Hope". Stilgar tells Lady Jessica "'What could the Harkonnens give us? Our freedom? Hah! No, you are the taqwa, that which buys us more than all the spice in the Harkonnen coffers.'"

name: Tau ceremony
description: see:Spice orgy

name: T-Probe
description: Device used to capture the thoughts of a person (living or dead) for analysis; unlike an Ixian probe it could not be blocked by the substance shere.

name: Tachyon net  (or tachyon web)
description: Technology (involving faster-than-light tachyon particles) used by Daniel and Marty in their attempt to track and capture the no-ship Ithaca.

name: Thinking Machines
description: Intelligent and sentient machines, created by humans, who enslaved much of humanity and eventually incited the Butlerian Jihad.

name: Thumper
description: Short stake with a spring-driven clapper at one end, placed in the sand to 'call' sandworms.

name: Titan
description: One of several ancient dictators whose brains were transplanted into fearsome, weaponized machine bodies to achieve immortality.

name: Training male (Bene Gesserit)
description: Males, conditioned by Bene Gesserit to perform sexual acts without expression of their feeling, used to train Bene Gesserit acolytes in sexual training.

name: Truthsayer
description: Bene Gesserit Reverend Mother trained to detect insincerity or falsehood. Naturally, anyone can be Truthsayer.

name: Ulema
description: a doctor of theology in Zensunni religion

name: Umma
description: One of the brotherhood of prophets; a term of scorn in the Corrino Imperium, meaning any "wild" person given to fanatical prediction.Also a personal revelation often experienced by a Fremen on Hajj.

name: Uroshnor
description: the most common autosuggestive cue word implanted by the Bene Gesserit,"itself empty of meaning, but which, when spoken, triggered a state of immobilization

name: Usul
description: a Fremen word meaning "the strength of the base of the pillar"

name: Verite
description: Will-destroying narcotic from Ecaz that rendered a person incapable of falsehood.

name: Voice
description: Training that allowed the Bene Gesserit to control others merely by selected tone shadings of the voice.

name: Wadquiyas
description: if one could force or convince a stranger or enemy to drink of his blood, he became Wadquiyaswith the tribe: joined to them as one of their own, and safe from having his water taken unless he offended the tribe. Because of this custom, no Fremen would ever attempt to wound an enemy in a fight by biting, no matter how a certain victory would grant to him).

name: Wali
description: the name the Fremen give to an untried youth.

name: War of Assassins
description: Regulated form of conflict between noble Houses.

name: Water of Life
description: Toxic liquid exhalation of a drowning sandworm, used by Fremen Reverend Mothers in the spice agony.

name: Water ring
description: Metal rings wore by Fremen women to indicate their household's possessed water.

name: Weirding Way
description: Specialized martial art component of Bene Gesserit prana-bindu practices.

name: Windowplaz (or plaz)
description: Synthetic glass, used for windows (especially in aircraft and spaceships) due to its superior strength.

name: Wind trap
description: A Facility used on Arrakis to trap moisture from the air, usually conceal in the warren rock.

name: Yali
description: A Fremen's personal quarters within the sietch.

name: Ya Hya Chouhada
description: A rallying cry for the Fremen troops - "long live the fighters!"

name: Zaha
description: the morning siesta on Arrakis.

name: Zanadiq
description: a fremen curse

name: Ze'eb
description: the wolf, as in the proverb "to know the difference between Ze'eb and Ke'leb".A Ze'eb is a person with true power and as such able to abuse it.

name: Zensunni
description: Ancient religious sect, ancestors of the Fremen.
